headline: Is First Solar Still an Opportunity After Its 35% Rally in 2025?
summary: Wondering whether First Solar is a bargain or too hot to handle? You are not alone, and the answer might surprise anyone watching renewable energy stocks. First Solar's share price has surged 35.2% year-to-date and is up 36.4% over the last year, even with some recent volatility such as a 10.1% gain in the last month followed by a 5.7% dip in the past week. Recent buzz around the stock has centered on federal policy tailwinds and optimistic analyst upgrades, which have sent solar sector...

headline: First Solar (FSLR) Rallied Following the Earnings Beat and Improved Guidance
summary: Ariel Investments, an investment management company, released its “Ariel Global Fund” third-quarter 2025 investor letter. A copy of the letter can be downloaded here. Global equities rallied in the third quarter, driven by AI enthusiasm, resilient corporate earnings, the first U.S. rate cut of the year, and targeted policy easing across key regions. headline: KeyBanc Raises First Solar (FSLR) Price Target After Mixed Earnings and Lower FY25 Outlook
summary: First Solar, Inc. (NASDAQ:FSLR) ranks among the best sustainability stocks to invest in. Despite announcing record quarterly volume and a solid third-quarter performance, First Solar, Inc. (NASDAQ:FSLR) released dismal full-year guidance on October 30. The company announced revenue of $1.59 billion, which narrowly exceeded the average estimate of $1.58 billion. However, owing to one-time underutilization […]
